title: Non-Computer-Based Experiential Activity Design to Improve Computational Thinking in Early Childhood

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computational thinking concepts and early childhood education experience
context.additional_context: A group of teachers and educators exploring pedagogical methods to apply computational thinking education for young children in elementary education settings

learning_goals: Ability to design at least three non-computer-based educational activities that promote algorithmic thinking in early childhood
Acquisition of methods to analyze errors occurring during experiential activities and explain debugging processes at a level appropriate for young learners
Ability to develop and implement computing thinking education toolkits utilizing physical activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
